thread.title: ‘MST3K’ revival: Netflix reveals first cast photo, premiere date
thread.title_full: ‘MST3K’ revival: Netflix reveals first cast photo, premiere date

author: Christian Holub
title: ‘MST3K’ revival: Netflix reveals first cast photo, premiere date
text:
Netflix 
Soon enough, it’ll be time for a new Robot Roll Call. 
On Wednesday, Netflix released the first cast photo of its upcoming Mystery Science Theater 3000 reboot. Jonah Ray is front and center as the show’s new host, surrounded by characters new and old. Patton Oswalt and Felicia Day play new mad scientist characters, while Hampton Yount and Baron Vaughn are in as the new voices for wise-cracking robots Crow T. Robot and Tom Servo. Original creator Joel Hodgson is still along for the ride as well. 
In addition to the photo, Netflix’s post announced the show will officially hit streaming on April 14. Check out the photo below. Show Full Article
